reviewText: This is the famous lost series...excellent to have it to complete the collection!
Very good! doesn't play on my laptop through DVD, don't know if it is the computer or the discs.

This set (season one) is a very hard to come by set. This series of painting /teaching videos are a priceless value. Bob is just so enjoyable to watch and listen to. His voice is so soothing. There simply is not an easier way to learn how to oil paint. I remember watching these as a child while growing up. And now my daughter is becoming a professional painter due to these videos, I mean she really is!! God bless you Bob, rest in peace, you are a legend never to be forgotton!
My daughter loves Bob Ross and this allows her to watch him whenever she wants.
Used to watch Bob Ross with my dad on PBS back in the day. Just another thing us 90's kids have on this generation! Anyways. Got this dvd for my Dad for a birthday gift. He loves it!!
Received DVD in good order. Seller again exceeded my expectations. Series 1 very good but gets better from episode to episode being earliest series.
I always watched the show and still do love being able to pause so I can see exactly how he is making the strokes.
